lead_paragraph: Ten video gamers will take on Formula E racing drivers in a virtual 'ePrix' in Las Vegas in January with $1 million in prize money to be won, organizers of the electric series announced on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Formula E Drivers to Race Video Gamers in Vegas Event
headline.main: Formula E Drivers to Race Video Gamers in Vegas Event

snippet: Ten video gamers will take on Formula E racing drivers in a virtual 'ePrix' in Las Vegas in January with $1 million in prize money to be won, organizers of the electric series announced on Thursday....
